title: Benchmark Gensuite
description: Benchmark ESG Reporting® offers enterprise leaders a comprehensive ESG data management platform with investment-grade insights and powerful real-time analytics, supporting sustainability commitments and culture change through user-friendly desktop and mobile applications.

children.value: Benchmark ESG Reporting® offers enterprise leaders a comprehensive ESG data management platform with investment-grade insights and powerful real-time analytics, supporting sustainability commitments and culture change through user-friendly desktop and mobile applications.
